author.name: Sam Turnbull â€¢ It Doesn't Taste Like Chicken

description: Just 5 ingredients and toss it in a skillet to fry up smoky, chewy, salty, mouthwatering vegan and vegetarian-friendly bacon. Use as a topping on soups, salads, sandwiches, pasta, pizza, or serve it with tofu scramble for a vegan breakfast.
keywords: easy mushroom bacon, how to make mushroom bacon, mushroom bacon, mushroom bacon recipe, vegan mushroom bacon
name: Quick & Easy Mushroom Bacon
recipeIngredient: 8 oz cremini or other type of mushrooms, (sliced )

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium bowl, mix together the olive oil, soy sauce, maple syrup, and liquid smoke. Add the sliced mushrooms to the bowl and gently toss to evenly coat the mushrooms.
